explanation: The stage direction 'Mais le Duc Dessau impatient de la perte de son Frère, se résout de s'opposer à ses desseins.' describes the Duke of Dessau's intent to oppose someone's plans out of impatience over the loss of his brother. This implies an aggressive or confrontational action, which fits the definition of category 1 (aggression).
stgdir: Mais le Duc Dessau impatient de la perte de son Frère, se résout de s'opposer à ses desseins.
